foreignData.name: Kühnes Küken
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf das Kühne Küken. Es erhält Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Polluelo sin miedo
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre el Polluelo sin miedo. Gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Oisillon intrépide
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur l'Oisillon intrépide. Il acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Pulcino Impavido
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, metti un segnalino +1/+1 sul Pulcino Impavido. Ha volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: 恐れなき雛
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、恐れなき雛の上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。ターン終了時まで、これは飛行を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — グリフィン

foreignData.name: 겁 없는 아기새
foreignData.text: 대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 겁 없는 아기새에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다. 겁 없는 아기새는 턴종료까지 비행을 얻는다.

foreignData.name: Filhotinho Intrépido
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entrar no campo de batalha sob seu controle, coloque um marcador +1/+1 em Filhotinho Intrépido. Ele ganha voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.name: Бесстрашный Птенец
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, положите один жетон +1/+1 на Бесстрашного Птенца. Он получает Полет до конца хода.

foreignData.name: 无惧雏鹫
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，在无惧雏鹫上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

foreignData.name: 無懼雛鷲
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，在無懼雛鷲上放置一個+1/+1指示物。它獲得飛行異能直到回合結束。

name: Fearless Fledgling
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Fearless Fledgling. It gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.
A landfall ability doesn’t trigger if a permanent already on the battlefield becomes a land.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Fearless Fledgling. It gains flying until end of turn.
